    • Machine

      public Machine (int x, int y, int localId, int globalId, Double energyConsumption)
      Constructor of which specifies the x-coordinate and y-coordinate (in cartesian coordinates), the local, global identifiers and the energy consumption.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      y - the y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      localId - the local identifier
      globalId - the global identifier
      energyConsumption - the energy consumption

    • connectedOutboundNodes

      public Set<GridItem> connectedOutboundNodes()
      It returns a set of connected nodes starting from this and ending in other grid items. Further, null will never be returned, that is, an empty set is at least returned.
      Returns:
      a set of connected outbound nodes.

    • connectedInboundNodes

      public Set<GridItem> connectedInboundNodes()
      It returns a set of connected nodes ending at this and starting from mother grid items. Further, null will never be returned, that is, an empty set is at least returned.
      Returns:
      a set of connected outbound nodes.

    • connectedSchedulableNodes

      public List<GridItem> connectedSchedulableNodes()
      It returns a list of connected schedulable nodes. Further, null will never be returned, that is, an empty list is at least returned.
      Returns:
      a list of connected schedulable nodes
